overview:
Alon is a technology geek with the unique ability to bridge between technology and business. With Over 20 years of experience, as a founder, manager and angel investor in technology companies, Alon has in-depth understanding of today’s technology environments and platforms. He knows how to recognize the next leading platforms and to forecast market evolution and disruption points. Most important, when Alon gets excited about new technology, he knows how to lock onto the correct business model and help in the combined execution of R&D and business.

Prior to co-founding Inimiti, Alon founded Nuvisio, a software company in the direct marketing space, and managed it’s merger with XMPie and its aquitition by Xerox (NYSE: XRX). He then served as a VP at Xerox managing strategy, business development and M&A for the VDP and ICM spaces. Before Nuvisio Alon was a co-founder in FrameworX Ltd. and an officer in the elite Intelligence unit of the IDF. Alon invested as an angel in several start-up companies and was an active advisory board member of Magnifire (sold to F5, NASDAQ: FFIV), Kaltura and more. He holds an MBA and a B.Sc in Mathematics and Computer Sciences from Tel-Aviv University.
